message: I think a 70/30 split is fair to start. Let's get this done!

I appreciate your offer, but I think a more balanced split would be fair. I'm proposing 55/45 in my favor since I'm affected by 10% inflation each round. This way we both get a good deal and can finish early.
Okay, Bob, let's try this again. Considering the inflation on my side, I'm bumping up your share. How about 60/40? This is a good deal for both of us.
